attributes.action: Petition to introduce a vote of 'NO CONFIDENCE' to all elections.
attributes.additional_details:
I fear that there are many people who do not vote as they have No Confidence in any of the options during an election, and that they see not voting as a protest. This is not the case, they are just not noticed.
If there was a vote of No Confidence option, then there would be a valid count visible of NO Confidence, that the powers that be would not be able to ignore.
attributes.background: As a UK voter I have looked at my choices and found I have no confidence in the options,so would like a chance to voice this.Surely there is no better way to show the countries feelings than to give an option to show your support for a particular party or that you have no confidence in any of them.
